name: it's like a piece of my childhood
description:
When I was a little girl, I used to paint the paper variegated, and then I used to cover the paper I painted with black oil pastel paint.  I used to draw a picture by scraping it on the paper I had prepared using a toothpick. It would be as if I were drawing with a rainbow on a black background. This is called the pastel scraping technique. 
Now I am a young woman and I wanted to try this scraping technique in a digital environment.
